title: Industrial journey
creator_credit: Fred Clarke and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
brief_description: Surveys Tasmania’s secondary industries, transportation system, and hydro-electric power scheme. Includes carpet and paper mills, zinc and cement works the Mt Lyle copper mines, an aluminium plant, canned frozen and dried food factories. Shows how the ferry service to the mainland handles goods economically as road transports drive on board with their cargo.
